mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.`level`, t.unit, t.sort FROM pms_category t
SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.`level`, t.unit, t.sort FROM pms_category t WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_category(name, level, unit) VALUES (#{name}, #{level}, #{unit})
mapper.update: UPDATE pms_category t SET t.`name` = #{name}, t.level = #{level}, t.unit = #{unit} WHERE t.id = #{id}
